title: 881 - As It Happens : A Song a Day Crossover
description:
A very sleepy crossover with our own Mystery Bard’s podcast “As It Happens : A Song A Day”. Settle in for a fun call across the night from a famous Steven that will have you saying "Holy Barbara Budd!”.
https://podcast.jonathanmann.net/ 
Commission a song from the Mystery Bard over at http://www.jonathanmann.net)
https://chartable.com/podcasts/as-it-happens-song-a-day/episodes/50502984-a-good-ol-fashioned-song-fight

Black Lives Matter. I cannot create a safe place for everyone without stopping to pause and look at what changes I need to make to support that fact. When I say “you deserve a good night’s sleep” it means black lives matter. I have a lot more work to do to back up my words with my body, mind, heart, and spirit. I’m starting here-
https://8cantwait.org/

Here is a list of Anti-racism resources- http://bit.ly/ANTIRACISMRESOURCES

Here are some links to some places you can find support. If you have more please share them! https://www.crisistextline.org/
https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/prepare/managing-stress-anxiety.html
